page.title: 08TRANSPORT (MOTORWAY M4)
page.content: The opening of the Motorway has been a distinct advantage to a farmer who has developed a farm shop(479727) near the Motorway interchange,for which he grows potatoes on his farm to the west He grows vegetables and 'pick your own fruit' on fields adjacent to the Motorway link.Winterbourne village is revitalised by its proximity but it has increased traffic on potentially dangerously narrow roads. It has split farms and meant bridges often not sufficently wide for today's machinery;fields were cut causing two hedges to be pulled up to amalgamate the remnants with a larger field.The danger of billowing smoke limits straw burning;rabbits breed on the verges and escape through fencing to the fields;hovering sparrowhawks search for small mammals;and the hunt can't risk its dogs running under traffic.
